II fldgi – wêlrK

609-B 081447— 353 (2018/09)

jeo.;a ksfõokhhs

ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2018 iema;eïn¾ ui 28 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2018 iema;eïn¾ ui 14 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'09'07

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
lka;f,a ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
lka;f,a Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha úNd. fldg wjika fyda le|jd wjika ù j¾I 05 ^myla& blau f.dia we;s my; wxl 
ork kvq jd¾;d 2018'12'07 jeks Èk fm' j' 10'00g wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY lrkq ,efí'
 úkdY lrkq ,nk kvq jd¾;dj, hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g kvq jd¾;dfõ msgm;la fyda fjk;a f,aLK wjYH kï 
hf:dala; Èkhg fmr ,nd .kakd f,i ±kqï foñ'
 2000 j¾Ifha isg 2006 olajd j¾Ij,g wod,j úkdY lrkq ,nk kvq jd¾;dj, wxlhka iys; ,ehsia;=j fï iu. 
bÈßm;a lrñ'

msial,a úlsŒï
Èid wêlrKh - y,dj;
wxl 4465$MB ork kvqjg wÞ,j y,dj; Èid wêlrKfha msial,a u.ska lrkq ,nk jákd foam,la m%isoaO 
fjkafoaisfha úlsŒuhs
jhU m<df;a" mq;a;,u Èia;%slalfha" y,dj; bvï ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï fldgig wh;a" W;=re msá.,a fldar,fha" wdkú¨kaoka 
m;a;=fõ" bÉpïmsáh keue;s .fï msysá" bÉpïmsáh tiafÜÜ ±kg isxymqr tiafÜÜ keue;s bvug k,ska fyar;a n,h,;a 
udkl ;ek úiska 2005'11'10 jeks Èk uek idok ,o wxl 2005$263 î ork msUqr m%ldr f,dÜ wxl 84 ork ìï lÜáh'
   bvfï m%udKh  ( wla' 00" rEâ' 00" m¾' 11'50

ld¾hd,fha ã 183$22 ys ,shdmÈxÑ ù we;'
   foam,g msúiSu '- uyjej isg y,dj; k.rh olajd f.dia t;ekska l=reKE., mdf¾ óg¾ 200la muK hk úg yuqjk 
LOLC y,dj; YdLdj wi,ska jug we;s mdf¾ u| ÿrla hk úg isxymqr tiafÜÜ keu;s len,s lr úl=Kkq ,nk bvug 
msúiqï fÞrgqj yuqfõ' t;ekska ol=Kq mig we;s mdf¾ fl<jrg hkúg jï w;g yuqjk mdf¾ yeÍ kej; ol=Kq w;g yeÍ

wÞ, foam, fõ'
   ks$msial,a úiska 2018 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 17 jeks nodod Èk fm' j' 11'30g foam, msysá ia:dkfha § m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha 
úl=Kkq ,efí'

Èid wêlrKh - y,dj;
wxl 4655$MB ork kvqjg wÞ,j y,dj; Èid wêlrKfha msial,a u.ska lrkq ,nk jákd foam,la m%isoaO 
fjkafoaisfha úlsŒu
jhU m<df;a" mq;a;,u Èia;%slalfha y,dj; bvï ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï fldgig wh;a" W;=re msá.,a fldar,fha" h.ïm;a;=fõ" 
uq.=Kqjgjk keue;s .fï msysá" fydrlef,a keu;s bvug" fÊ' tA' ù' rdcmCI n,h,;a udkl ;ek úiska 2006'05'06 jk 
Èk uek idok ,o wxl 287$06 ork msUqr m%ldr f,dÜ wxl 01 ork ìï lÜáh' 
   bvfï m%udKh  ( wla' 0" rEâ' 01" m¾' 37'50 
   Bg wh;a .yfld<" m<;=re" f.dvke.s,s wd§ iEu ish¨ foa;a fï iuÕ fõ' fuh y,dj; bvï ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï 
ld¾hd,fha udo 23$85 ys ,shdmÈxÑ ù we;'
   foam,g msúiSu '- udoïfma l=,shdmsáh ud¾.fha udoïfma isg ls' ó' 2 muK .sh miq ol=Kq miska yuqjk iqÿje,a, 
m%d:ñl mdie, wi,ska ol=Kg we;s ud¾.fha ls' ó' 1 muK .sh miq yuqjk y;ruka ykaÈfhka jug yeÍ ó' 500 muK .sh 
miq ol=Kq miska yuqjk neis,a uqo,sf.a udjf;a jïmi we;s 4 jk ksji msysá foam, ks$msial,a úiska 2018 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 
10 jk nÞÞ Èk fm' j' 11'30 g foam, msysá ia:dkfha § m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha úl=Kkq ,efí'
   f.ùfï l%uh' - fjkafoaish wjidkfha ñ< ;Skaÿ jQ jydu id¾:l .eKqïlre úiska my; i|yka f.ùï uqo,ska f.úh 
hq;=h'
 1' .eKqï ñf,ka 25] la ^ishhg úismyla&
 2' m<df;a wêldßhg f.úh hq;= 1] ^ishhg tll& úl=Kqï nÿ
 3' msial,a fldñia uqo," isú,a kvq úOdk ix.%yfha 258 j.ka;sh m%ldrj jk fldñia uqo,
 4' ish¨u m%pdrl .dia;=
